name: Tech. lead/Технический руководитель проекта (drones)
description:
The UVL Robotics is an international Company offering drone-based solutions for warehouses and delivery. Our offices are located in Russia, US, Turkey, Kazakhstan, Ukraine and Belarus. It is the 1st Company in the world to offer drone-based warehouse inventory count system. We are inviting professionals to join us to develop the leading technologies together.

On this position you will:

  • Develop technical aspects of the UVL Robotics’s strategy to ensure alignment with its business goals
  • Discover and implement new drone technologies that yield competitive advantage
  • Help Delivery drone departments use technology profitably
  • Build quality assurance and data protection processes
  • Monitor KPIs and IT budgets to assess technological performance
  • Reduce the risk of technological breaches
  • Protect sensitive digital information
  • Make executive decisions regarding our company’s technological needs
  • Use stakeholders’ feedback to inform necessary improvements and adjustments to technology
  • Communicate our technology strategy to our partners as well as investors

Our ideal candidate:

  • Has a strong business acumen and is a strategic thinker.
  • Has proven experience as a Tech lead or similar lead role in the field of Robotics/Drones
  • Has a strong knowledge of technological trends in robotics/drones
  • Understands budgeting and business planning
  • English – B2 and higher
  • Highly organized, proactive, has excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Can conduct technological analyses and research

We offer:

  • Competitive salary, long-term contract
  • Strong international team of experts in the field
  • Flexible working hours

If you think you’re a good match, send your CV, we’re ready to consider your candidacy.
